about_the_game:
THIS GAME IS IN DEVELOPMENT. SCREENSHOTS, OTHER TEASERS, AND DESCRIPTIONS WILL BE SUBJECT TO CHANGE AS PROGRESS IS MADE.

High Velocity Arena blends an arena shooter, hero shooter, and twin-stick shooter into fast-paced multiplayer experience unlike any other. Pick between five classes, aka “Polygons”, each of which sport an entirely unique arsenal of weapons, abilities, and modifications. Battle across a multitude maps set anywhere from a golf course to Mars, and triumph over your opponents!

Features HVA Has

  • Over 100 different possible loadouts for any playstyle
  • Many maps with multiple different gamemodes
  • Accounts are a username and password - nothing more
  • A developer that cares about his game and its community

Features HVA Doesn’t Have

  • Skill-based matchmaking in Casual
  • Microtransactions
  • Ads
  • Data harvesting

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newe
  • Processor: 500 MHz Processor or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 support
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: High Velocity Arena is a refreshing take on the top-down shooter genre, boasting surprisingly nuanced yet satisfyingly snappy movement and gunplay. Pick between five classes, dozens of loadouts, and slide into 5v5 battles to dominate your opponents in Payload, KOTH, Attack-Defense, and more.
